data_table.description: Sample ID, organ or tissue from which sample was collected, specific site of sample, analyte type, tumor status, age at the time sample was collected, chemotherapy or radiotherapy prior to sample collection, lymphoma subgroup for study purposes, and clinical diagnostic classification of tumor by WHO 2008 criteria of participants with B-cell lymphoma and involved in the "Detection of Enhancer-Associated Rearrangements Reveals Mechanisms of Oncogene Dysregulation in B-cell Lymphoma" project.

variable.name: ORGAN_TISSUE
variable.description: Organ or tissue from which sample was collected

variable.name: IS_TUMOR
variable.description: Whether sample represents malignant lymphoid tissue

variable.name: AGE_AT_BIOPSY
variable.description: Patient's age at the time sample was collected

variable.name: PRIOR_TREATMENT
variable.description: Indicates lymphoma-directed chemotherapy or radiotherapy prior to sample collection
variable.value: No prior chemotherapy and / or radiation therapy
Prior chemotherapy and / or radiation therapy

variable.name: WHO_CLASS
variable.description: Clinical diagnostic classification of tumor by WHO 2008 criteria
variable.value: Chronic lymphocytic leukemia / small lymphocytic lymphoma
Diffuse large B cell lymphoma, not otherwise specified
B-cell lymphoma unclassifiable, with features intermediate between Burkitt lymphoma and diffuse large B-cell lymphoma
Diffuse large B-cell lymphoma and follicular lymphoma, grade 3B
Primary mediastinal large B cell lymphoma
